name: GRAVEL RUNWAY PLANE SPOTTING! 737-200, Twin Otter, Dash 8 and MORE at Puvirnituq Airport! (4K)
description:
Puvirnituq is a small town of 1600 people in Northern Quebec, located on the coast of Hudson Bay, just above 60°N. Puvirnituq Airport serves as a lifeline for the community, with a 6,299' gravel runway that hosts a number of interesting visitors each day.

Enjoy this rare plane spotting video from one of Canada's most remote regions!

Thank you to RadarBox for supporting this plane spotting video! Find out more about them at https://www.radarbox.com/?referrer=AlexAviation

FLIGHT INFORMATION
00:00 - Intro
00:41 - Air Inuit DHC-6 Twin Otters Taxiing/Loading
02:47 - Air Inuit DHC-6 Twin Otter (C-GMDC) to Salluit (YZG)
04:29 - Air Inuit Dash 8-300 (C-GXAI) to Salluit (YZG)
06:33 - Air Inuit DHC-6 Twin Otter (C-FAIY) Taxiing
07:38 - Panorama Pilatus PC-12 (C-FYRH) from Alma (YTF)
08:43 - Air Inuit DHC-6 Twin Otter (C-GTYX) to Kuujjuaq (YVP)
09:18 - Air Inuit DHC-6 Twin Otter (C-FAIY) to Mansel Island
10:36 - Panorama Pilatus PC-12 (C-FYRH) to La Grande Rivière (YGL)
11:32 - Air Inuit DHC-6 Twin Otter (C-GMDC) from Salluit (YZG)
12:45 - MAX Aviation King Air 200 (C-GCVS) from Inukjuak (YPH)
13:38 - Air Inuit 737-200 (C-GSPW) from Montreal (YUL)
15:37 - Air Inuit Dash 8-300 (C-FOAI) from Akulivik (AKV)
16:49 - Air Inuit King Air 350 (C-FKMG) from Kuujjuaq (YVP)
18:09 - Air Inuit Dash 8-300 (C-FOAI) to Inukjuak (YPH)
19:26 - Air Inuit 737-200 (C-GSPW) to La Grande Rivière (YGL)
21:47 - Air Inuit King Air 350 (C-FKMG) to Kuujjuaq (YVP)
